summary: Default image tiles in place for null maptiles because there is no tile for that zoom level .

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.you scroll to a location ,where you have't any tile in your local memory. 2.null tile will be shown .i want to show an image showing "zoom out to see" 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? osmdroid 4.3 Please provide any additional information below.
